title: "[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] GET /invoice-financings/contracts/{contractId}/scheduled-payments endpoint"
description: "[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Endpoint that our client must implement to respond the Resources request ```(GET /invoice-financings/contracts/{contractId}/scheduled-payments)```. **FamilyType**: ```Direitos Creditórios Descontados``` This endpoint will be used by the Receiver to get the resources offered by our customer. This endpoint must behave exactly as the specified on the  [Open Banking Brazil Oficial Documentation](https://openfinancebrasil.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OF/pages/474579114/Informa+es+T+cnicas+-+DC+Direitos+Credit+rios+Descontados+-+v2.2.0), except by the Authentication type, it must implement a mTLS The path can be parametrized by the client, it is just a suggestion, except by the fact that it must receive the ```DataConsentId``` and ```PactualId``` as a route or query parameter."

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] GET /invoice-financings/contracts/\\{contractId\\}/scheduled-payments endpoint"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/client-implementation/data/v2/invoice-financings/contracts/{consentPactualId}/{pactualId}/{contractId}/scheduled-payments"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Endpoint that our client must implement to respond the Resources request ```(GET /invoice-financings/contracts/{contractId}/scheduled-payments)```. **FamilyType**: ```Direitos Creditórios Descontados``` This endpoint will be used by the Receiver to get the resources offered by our customer. This endpoint must behave exactly as the specified on the  [Open Banking Brazil Oficial Documentation](https://openfinancebrasil.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OF/pages/474579114/Informa+es+T+cnicas+-+DC+Direitos+Credit+rios+Descontados+-+v2.2.0), except by the Authentication type, it must implement a mTLS The path can be parametrized by the client, it is just a suggestion, except by the fact that it must receive the ```DataConsentId``` and ```PactualId``` as a route or query parameter.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"contractId","description":"Identificador do contrato para todos os tipos de operação de crédito.","schema":{"maxLength":100,"pattern":"^[a-zA-Z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9-]{0,99}$","type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true},{"name":"page","description":"Número da página que está sendo requisitada (o valor da primeira página é 1).","schema":{"format":"int32","default":1,"maximum":2147483647,"minimum":1,"type":"integer"},"in":"query"},{"name":"page-size","description":"Quantidade total de registros por páginas.","schema":{"format":"int32","default":25,"maximum":1000,"minimum":1,"type":"integer"},"in":"query"},{"name":"pagination-key","description":"Identificador de rechamada, utilizado para evitar a contagem de chamadas ao endpoint durante a paginação.","schema":{"maxLength":2048,"pattern":"[\\w\\W\\s]*","type":"string"},"in":"query"},{"name":"pactualId","description":"The Data operation PactualId","schema":{"format":"uuid","type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true},{"name":"consentPactualId","description":"The Consent PactualId","schema":{"format":"uuid","type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
